entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.263.3: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
üêõ Closed Issues

  • [closed] üêõ Bug:Meta database configuration missing database name #11380
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: button-type field can't open local url #11346
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Support for Private Views (Only Visible to the Creator) #11342
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Is Nocodb.com down right now? #11341
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Import Data From SQLite #11337
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Issue with copy date and time values #11335
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Nix run fails with "hash mismatch" #11332
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Adding more functional views #11330
  • [Status: Reproducible] üêõ Bug: formula with lookup error #11326
  • [Status: Reproducible] üêõ Bug: update link column, then last modified by, time isn't updated #11324
  • [Status: Reproducible] üêõ Bug: Copying Date from another field pastes the wrong value #11323
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Group function cannot work with user #11318
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Search in Gallery view is broken #11306
  • [closed] how to minio config? #11303
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: large attachment upload error #11301
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Cannot search in ‚ÄúHas Many‚Äù column auto-generated via foreign key on import #11300
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: SQLITE_ERROR: no such column for lookup cols on 0.263.* #11299
  • [Status: Reproducible] üêõ Bug: Grouping by lookup field - no titles on group #11289
  • [Status: Reproducible] üêõ Bug: Calendar view disable weekends by year, still shows weekends #11273
  • [üîé Status: More Info Needed] üêõ Bug: Ctrl + F / Filter on formula field not working after Update to 0.263.0 #11266
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Allow images / attachments to be external #11264
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Include Empty Checkbox in Lookup Even When value is falsy #11037
  • [closed] üî¶ Enhancement: Calendar view tab alignment fix #10838

What's Changed

  • fix: improve types for NcError by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11297
  • fix: groupby rendering issue with nested lookups by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11296
  • fix: Formula filter - avoid mutating column object by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11294
  • Nc Fix: Exanded form navigation & display value issue by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11302
  • feat: Calendar end Date (DateTime) by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11267
  • chore(nc-gui): lint by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11317
  • Nc fix: Cursor pointer issue in row meta column (Index column) by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11319
  • fix: lookup-formula-nested by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11307
  • fix: base & model extract by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11298
  • fix: sidebar by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11255
  • docs: fix NC_DISABLE_PG_DATA_REFLECTION description by @salim-b in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11322
  • chore: missing changes by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11328
  • Nc fix/checkbox issue by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11327
  • fix(nix): hash bump by @sinanmohd in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11340
  • Nc fix/discussion mode followup changes by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11286
  • fix: gallery search & date copy paste Nc fix/gallery search date copy paste by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11331
  • Nc docs/expanded record modes by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11343
  • feat: mcp server by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11310
  • fix: avoid calling loadIntegrations, instead use derived from workspace by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11353
  • fix: user group by for user count > 25 by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11349
  • fix: improve bulk update by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11355
  • fix: canvas perf regression by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11364
  • feat: show no access message if license key limited with 1 workspace by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11366
  • test: skip expand modes in OSS by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11360
  • fix single line text not valid for field schema by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11369
  • fix: audit user join by @mertmit in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11373
  • fix (nocodb): multi user replace for order by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11370
  • fix off-by-1 index problem by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11365
  • Nc Fix: add missing docs link of supported preview file type in expanded form file mode by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11377
  • feat: script templates by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11379
  • fix: Table delete - handle scenarios when user not in table page by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11383
  • feat: add version in sidebar - sync by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11371
  • fix: calendar date field fixes by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11387
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11391
  • fix: Missing appInfo reference by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11392
  • Nc fix/localhost url by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11359

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.263.1...0.263.3

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.263.4: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
üêõ Closed Issues

  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Lookup Field Not Displaying Attachment Thumbnails in Grid View & Cover Images in Gallery View #11406
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Table cells being wiped without entries in the 'Audits' display #11405
  • [closed] The open source version does not have Workspaces #11399
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: New Record Button Covers up Entries in Group Mode #11080
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Auto Upstall fails reinstall #10159

What's Changed

  • Nc fix/user role issue by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11164
  • feat: audit logs support by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11358
  • fix: allow to omit S3 region when endpoint is given by @salim-b in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11386
  • refactor: improve SMTPPlugin help_texts by @salim-b in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11385
  • feat: script using v3 apis by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11382
  • fix(upstall): kvstore init by @sinanmohd in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/10363
  • chore(nix/package/pnpmDeps): bump hash by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11398
  • fix: User group-by bug by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11400
  • refactor: tweak strings by @salim-b in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11396
  • Nc refactor: Sidebar navigation by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11352
  • feat: introduce NC_SMTP_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED by @salim-b in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11384
  • Nc codegen bot/add search to experimental features by @AMEESHAARACKAL in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11403
  • fix: preserve non-aliased fields in result mapping by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11409
  • fix: meta v3 swagger by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11401
  • fix (nocodb): update missing fields set column to empty by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11412
  • fix (nc-gui): ui sorting by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11376
  • refactor: out selectObject from baseModel by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11407
  • Nc fix(nc-gui): filter field list input text truncate issue by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11413
  • Nc fix/mini sidebar followup by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11416

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.263.3...0.263.4

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.263.8: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
üêõ Closed Issues

  • [Status: Reproducible] üêõ Bug: Record revision history is gone after I updated to version 0.263.6. #11668
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Failed to sync count: m.rootApply is not a function #11628
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: With Minio v0.263.6+ crashes repeatedly #11666
  • [Status: Reproducible] üêõ Bug: The search field is blocked #11669
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: fill handle not working for "Date" and "Date time" fields in 0.263.6 #11667

  • [üîé Status: More Info Needed] üêõ Bug: Error when sharing table for public viewing #11372
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: MinIO Latest Image doesn't support all CPUs #11635
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Email field > Accept only valid emails > Fails on complex email addresses #11632
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: decimal issue for currency #11625
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: On Linux, Shift + scroll is not working on Grid View 2.0 #11619
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Can't setup Minio as storage #11614
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Always clear and close search box on esc #11591

  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: how to Integrate with sql server database #11411
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Duplicating tables creates empty tables #11404
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: When a linked column ID is used as a column name in SQL Query, it's truncated and not properly escaped #11375
  • [closed] üî¶ Feature: Use single-select filter values in views as default when adding new records #11374
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Error in Formula column referencing Lookup columns/fields #11368

  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Cannot create a SingleLineText field via API v3 #11313

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.264.0: Enhanced Webhook & Data APIs
entry.content:
üöÄ NocoDB : Feature Release

Webhook v3 ‚Äì Smarter triggers, cleaner automation

Streamline your integrations with unified events, richer payloads, and flexible trigger options. Webhook v3 gives you precise control over when and how data changes are pushed to external systems‚Äîno extra overhead, no missed updates.

What‚Äôs Changed?

  • üîÅ Unified event types ‚Äì Webhooks for single and bulk operations are now simplified to just three: after insert, after update, and after delete.
  • üì¶ Richer payloads ‚Äì Bulk inserts now include the actual records, not just the count.
  • ‚öôÔ∏è Send Everything toggle ‚Äì Capture all changes (Insert, Update, Delete) in one config‚Äîor fine-tune to specific events.
  • üß† Field-level triggers ‚Äì Trigger webhooks only when certain fields (like Status or Priority) change.*

Field-level triggers are available on self-hosted Enterprise and NocoDB Cloud plans.

You can upgrade existing webhook configurations to v3 via the UI with just a few clicks‚Äîcomplete with a helpful side-by-side comparison of what changes in the response.

üìò Learn more and view upgrade steps in our docs: Webhook v2 vs v3

API v3 ‚Äì Fewer calls, cleaner design

Build faster with a consistent, RESTful API that returns richer relation data, supports in-place record linking, and offers predictable, project-scoped endpoints‚Äîmaking integrations simpler and more efficient.

What‚Äôs Changed?

  • üîó Embedded relation field data ‚Äì Listing records now returns paginated linked records inline, reducing the need for multiple calls.
  • ‚úçÔ∏è Unified record linking in CRUD ‚Äì Create or update record links directly inside the main API call‚Äîno more separate link/unlink steps.
  • üìò Standardized responses & errors ‚Äì More predictable envelopes, status codes, and consistent field handling across create/update operations.

Why It Matters:

  • üöÄ Reduced API traffic ‚Äì Fewer HTTP calls thanks to embedded relations and unified operations.
  • üîÑ Simplified workflows ‚Äì Handle records and relationships in a single request‚Äîno orchestration needed.

üìò Explore the API docs: API v3 Reference

entry.title: New release for NocoDB: 0.264.2: Bug Fix Release
entry.content:
üêõ Closed Issues

  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Nuxt loading indicator progress bar stuck in loading state if we expand record or close it #11997
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: File Attachments Disappeared | Backblaze B2 Integration #11995
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: API Endpoint for creating bases #11990
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Missing array functions in formula field #11953
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: linux binary "Error sending email. Cannot find package 'react-dom'" #11947
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: Colouring records function is not apply to normal grid view #11933
  • [closed] üêõ Bug: The audit log is only available to super admins. #11886

What's Changed

  • Nc fix/base access issue by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11977
  • Nc chore(nc-gui): add isOnPrem toggle support in feature flag by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11989
  • Nc Fix: button field related issues by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11988
  • chore: nc sync (dashboard) by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11961
  • feat: enable dashboard by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11991
  • fix: Rollup validation - validate function against rollup column by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11994
  • feat(nc-gui): Fields menu search based on column title + description + button label by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11974
  • feat: expand all by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11983
  • fix(nc-gui): manually stop page loading indicator if view page query params changes by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11998
  • chore(nc-gui): add missing docs links by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11999
  • do not filter undefined id attachments by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/12001
  • chore: Revert Dockerfile changes since it's breaking arm/v7 build by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/12002
  • fix(nc-gui): decimal cell data loss issue on keydown enter by @dstala in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/12006
  • chore: post-release sync by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/12005
  • fix: layout order randomizes by @DarkPhoenix2704 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11996
  • Nc fix(nc-gui): percent progress bar issue in expanded form by @rameshmane7218 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/12000
  • fix: Correct alias column handling in meta-sync by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/11987
  • Nc feat/on prem plan by @pranavxc in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/12011
  • fix: attachment for oss add more strict condition for processing by @fendy3002 in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/pull/12010

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/compare/0.264.0...0.264.2
